unnormalised: EduTech Boost: Scholarship Portals Leveling the Playing Field!
normalised: EduTech Boost: Scholarship Portals Leveling the Playing Field!

unnormalised: Hey students! Feeling the pinch after those Diwali expenses? Don't sweat it! A new wave of scholarship portals are making it easier than ever to find funding for your education. Gone are the days of endless paper applications and chasing professors for recommendations (though, those still help!).
normalised: Hey students! Feeling the pinch after those Diwali expenses? Don't sweat it! A new wave of scholarship portals are making it easier than ever to find funding for your education. Gone are the days of endless paper applications and chasing professors for recommendations (though, those still help!).

unnormalised: These platforms, like "VidyaDhan" and "ScholarSphere," are connecting students across India – from bustling Mumbai to remote villages in Kerala – with scholarships ranging from Rs. 5000 to a full ride. Think of them as the Zomato of educational funding - tons of options, easily searchable!
normalised: These platforms, like "VidyaDhan" and "ScholarSphere," are connecting students across India – from bustling Mumbai to remote villages in Kerala – with scholarships ranging from rupee five thousand to a full ride. Think of them as the Zomato of educational funding - tons of options, easily searchable!

unnormalised: Forget slogging through government websites! These portals aggregate opportunities, filtering by course, location (even your chacha’s hometown near Patna!), and academic background.
normalised: Forget slogging through government websites! These portals aggregate opportunities, filtering by course, location (even your chacha’s hometown near Patna!), and academic background.

unnormalised: Many even offer free counselling and application tips – essential when you're busy cramming for that engineering entrance exam. Imagine fueling your biryani-powered late-night study sessions with scholarship money!
normalised: Many even offer free counselling and application tips – essential when you're busy cramming for that engineering entrance exam. Imagine fueling your biryani-powered late-night study sessions with scholarship money!

unnormalised: Experts say this tech-driven approach is democratizing access to education, especially for students from economically weaker sections. So, this Onam, instead of just enjoying the sadhya, consider applying for that scholarship you've been eyeing! Applications for the "Inspire India" scholarship close on Oct 26th, so hurry! #EduTech #Scholarships #India #MakeItHappen
normalised: Experts say this tech-driven approach is democratizing access to education, especially for students from economically weaker sections. So, this Onam, instead of just enjoying the sadhya, consider applying for that scholarship you've been eyeing! Applications for the "Inspire India" scholarship close on October twenty sixth, so hurry! hash EduTech hash Scholarships hash India hash MakeItHappen
